授業目的: This course aims at enabling graduate students review and analyze global "policy formulation and implementation", focusing on key elements for reforming international organizations in the context of the United Nations system. The relevant policy makers and managers are actively involved in bringing about important changes seen through "Millenium Development Goals"/"Sustainable Development Goals" along with the “UN reform "at large.
到達目標:
1. Students will be able to understand how to associate with global policy agenda --- the complexed issues of UN system and the stake holders at large.
2. Students will be able to understand the UN challenges under the leadership of UN Secretary General.
3. Students will be able to understand the recent trend of development policy for both bi/multi-lateral institutions
特記事項: 【合併】中国企業会計（国際学研究科前期）/アジア会計論特殊講義（商学研究科前期）/International Public Policy　（大学院共通科目・認定科目前期）/International Public Policy（国際学研究科前期）/国際公共政策論　（司法研究科）/International Public Policy　（経営戦略研究科）
関連科目: Relevant to International Organization, Political Economy, Organizational Behavior, Sustainable Development, International Law and Order, Public Management and Policy Choice, etc.
授業の概要・背景: This course is to explore the opportunities of a range of interests of the major stakeholders in the context of international development such as development policy and its governance/participation in formulating the relevant policy agenda. The course will be taught by UN and other practitioners and experts equipped with extensive professional experience in those areas.
授業方法: This class will be held in seminar/lecture style (Face to face format). The course schedule adjustment will be notified as deemed necessary. Resource person(s) would encourage students for their active class discussion in focusing on selected topics. A joint session of Professor Shun-ichi Murata and resource person(s) will be planned. Please note that the course may be conducted by on-line for the designated slots of resource persons.
